titleStmt.title: The seige of Breda by the armes of Phillip the Fourt vnder the gouernment of Isabella atchiued by the conduct of Ambr. Spinola
Obsidio Bredana armis Philippi IIII. English
titleStmt.author: Hugo, Herman, 1588-1629.
Barry, Gerat.

notesStmt.note: A translation of: Obsidio Bredana armis Philippi IIII.
Translator's dedication signed: Gerrat Barry. Irish.
Colophon reads: "Louanii, ex officinâ Henrici Hastenii, vrbis & Academiæ typographi, M.DC.XXVIII.".
The first leaf and the last two leaves are blank.
Running title reads: The siedge of Breda.
The plates are copied from the Latin edition printed at Antwerp, 1626.
Identified as STC 1529 on UMI microfilm.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
